game.name: ActRaiser

game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/Nintendo - Super Nintendo Entertainment System/Aero the Acro-Bat 2 (USA).sfc

game.name: Aerobiz
game.path: /mnt/store/Emulation/Games/Nintendo - Super Nintendo Entertainment System/Aerobiz (USA).sfc

If you cannot turn a profit for a year or meet the victory conditions in 32 years you lose. Some strategic decisions you must make include negotiating for open air routes...

game.desc: Assault Suits Valken (????????? Juso Kihei Varuken?), is a run and gun game released in 1992 for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. game.name: Barbie Super Model

game.name: Bass Masters Classic
